titleStmt.title: For as moche as late by the comau[n]dement of the right hye [and] noble princesse my right redoubted lady my lady Margarete by the grace of god Duchesse of Bourgoyne Brabant [et]c. [...] as to the historie of Iason [...]
Jason et Medée. English
titleStmt.author: Lefèvre, Raoul, fl. 1460.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation by William Caxton, of Le Fefèvre, Raoul. Jason et Medée.
Title from opening words of text. Imprint from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 47 and at reel 1385 (both British Library copy).
